ygData.subject: RE: Even more on ebw...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is this just a guess or do you have knowledge that this is the correct level? It will be a pain in the butt to get my friends to go over there, and I don t
ygData.messageBody:
> I'm thinking it's feasible with a few 22s (give or take a few levels) but
> what I wish I knew now is where Arlena spawned.
> And as a side note, how can a dark elven sk get to Dekam N'Tazi?

Is this just a guess or do you have knowledge that this is the correct
level? It will be a pain in the butt to get my friends to go over there, and
I don't want to gett ehre and find she'll kick our butts. :)

On the side note -- According to Allakhazam's (everquest.gamestats.com) that
NPC is in Neriak. Dunno who is right or wrong. I am writing a paper tonight
(um, well, I'm supposed to be at least) so I can not log on or it will never
be done. This site says:
::When you return the item to Grimrot, you will receive two items: a
blackened blade hilt
::(LORE) and a note, and more info on how to complete the quest. Take the
note to the NPC
::Dekam N'Tazi near SK guild in Neriak, and you will get a LORE item,
blackened iron mold, a
::container with 2 slots in it plus a combine button.

If anyone has direct knowledge of this quest, feel free to let us know who
is right. :)

Back to procrastinating, er, um, writing my paper,
Jeremy
